name: tvws
description: Browser-compatible TradingView WebSocket API with extensible event system
author: badsector666 <badsectorkiller666@gmail.com>

scripts.build: bun run build:browser && bun run build:esm && bun run build:node && bun run build:types
scripts.build:esm: bun build src/index.ts --outfile dist/tvws.esm.js --target browser --format esm --minify
scripts.build:node: bun build src/index.ts --outfile dist/tvws.cjs --target node --format cjs
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run clean && bun run build
scripts.examples: echo 'Run examples:' && echo '  Basic Node.js: node examples/basic-usage.cjs' && echo '  Advanced: node examples/advanced-usage.cjs' && echo '  Trading Dashboard: node examples/trading-dashboard.cjs' && echo '  Browser (Bun): cd examples && bun run bun-simple.html' && echo '  Browser (ESM): cd examples && bun run bun-test.html'
